Class XProcess

  • Object
    • XProcess
  • public class XProcess
extends Object
    Wraps standard Process class with convenient methods

      Consumes stderr stream into internal buffer.

    • Method Detail

      • stdoutAsString

        public String stdoutAsString()
        Returns standard output as a string. This call will consume stdout stream meaning that you can call it only once. If you want to call it multiple times make sure to flush stdout first.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called more than once
        See Also:
        flushStdout()

      • flushStdout

        public void flushStdout()
        Consumes stdout stream into internal buffer.

      • stderrAsString

        public String stderrAsString()
        Returns standard error output as a string. This call will consume stderr stream meaning that you can call it only once. If you want to call it multiple times make sure to flush stderr first.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called more than once
        See Also:
        flushStderr()

      • flushStderr

        public void flushStderr()
        Consumes stderr stream into internal buffer.

        public Stream<String> stdout()
        After you consume this stream it will not be longer valid.
        See Also:

        After you consume this stream it will not be longer valid.

        public int getCode()
